segments.text: Good afternoon . It's a pleasure to see you again ! What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've come in to give you the documents under the L / C we opened , the new one . This lot are from Singapore , a new customer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had a chance to go through them yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , with a fine toothed comb , as usual . Everything seems fine , except for one thing . The description of the items we are purchasing is a little different from what we expected .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not really , perhaps just a translation problem , that's all . Anyway , we've agreed to accept it .
segments.speaker: S2
